name: OR_IMP_PACEMAKER_DEPEND
description: This table stores information related to the Settings When Magnet Removed (I IMP 56739) item.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PACEMAKER_DEP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores whether a patient is pacemaker dependent or not.
